WISDOMVIAL.name: Wisdom Vial
WISDOMVIAL.description: It raises the SpAtk and Speed stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

TOUGHNESSVIAL.name: Toughness Vial
TOUGHNESSVIAL.description: It raises the Atk and Def stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

HPRESETBAG.name: HP Reset Disc
HPRESETBAG.description: A special program that causes the Pokémon to forget its training in the HP stat.

ATKRESETBAG.name: Attack Reset Disc
ATKRESETBAG.description: A special program that causes the Pokémon to forget its training in the Attack stat.

DEFRESETBAG.name: Defense Reset Disc
DEFRESETBAG.description: A special program that causes the Pokémon to forget its training in the Defense stat.

SPDRESETBAG.name: Speed Reset Disc
SPDRESETBAG.description: A special program that causes the Pokémon to forget its training in the Speed stat.

SPATKRESETBAG.name: Sp.Atk Reset Disc
SPATKRESETBAG.description: A special program that causes the Pokémon to forget its training in the Sp.Atk stat.

SPDEFRESETBAG.name: Sp.Def Reset Disc
SPDEFRESETBAG.description: A special program that causes the Pokémon to forget its training in the Sp.Def stat.

SHARPCORAL.name: Sharp Coral
SHARPCORAL.description: An item to be held by Cubone or Marowak. It is a sharp coral of some sort that boosts the Attack stat.

OSPELLBOOK.name: Arcane Spellbook
OSPELLBOOK.description: An item to be held by Omanyte or Omastar. It is a spellbook that boosts the Special Attack stat.

FOCUSINGORB.name: Focusing Orb
FOCUSINGORB.description: An item to be held by Clamperl that will double both its defense stats.

VOIDHEART.name: Void Heart
VOIDHEART.description: An item to be held by Volbeat that will multiply its Atk/Def stats by 50%.

RADIANTORB.name: Radiant Orb
RADIANTORB.description: An item to be held by Illumise that will multiply its Sp.Atk/Sp.Def stats by 50%.

HEADPHONES.name: Headphones
HEADPHONES.description: The holder will be immune to sound moves until hit. Once hit, this item will break.

ORANGESHARD.name: Orange Shard
ORANGESHARD.description: A small orange shard. It appears to be from some sort of implement made long ago.

PURPLESHARD.name: Purple Shard
PURPLESHARD.description: A small purple shard. It appears to be from some sort of implement made long ago.

ROSERADETEA.name: Roserade Tea
ROSERADETEA.description: A soothing flavoured tea. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 150 points.

REDTAUROS.name: Red Tauros
REDTAUROS.description: A powerful energy drink that gives you wings. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 250 points.

CUBICOLA.name: Cubicola
CUBICOLA.description: A sugary carbonated cola. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 375 points.

SBUXCOFFEE.name: Sawsbucks Coffee
SBUXCOFFEE.description: A powerful caffeinated beverage. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 500 points.

SUPERBALL.name: Super Ball
SUPERBALL.description: A super-performance Ball that provides a higher Pokémon catch rate than a Great Ball.

BOOSTERPACK.name: Booster Pack
BOOSTERPACK.description: A booster pack for Triple Triad game. Contains 5 cards.

STARTERPACK.name: Starter Pack
STARTERPACK.description: A booster pack for Triple Triad game. Contains 3 starter cards.

TIER1PACK.name: Tier 1 Pack
TIER1PACK.description: A booster pack for the Triple Triad card game containing Tier 1 cards. Contains 5 cards.

TIER2PACK.name: Tier 2 Pack
TIER2PACK.description: A booster pack for the Triple Triad card game containing Tier 2 cards. Contains 5 cards.

TIER3PACK.name: Tier 3 Pack
TIER3PACK.description: A booster pack for the Triple Triad card game containing Tier 3 cards. Contains 5 cards.

BODYARMOR.name: Body Armor
BODYARMOR.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This body armor prevents the user from sustaining recoil damage.

BOATPASS.name: Boat Pass
BOATPASS.description: A ticket required to board the ship to Lyra City.

TELEPORTPASS.name: Teleport Pass
TELEPORTPASS.description: A pass required to use the Teleporter to Mensa Village.

DRIFBLIMPPASS.name: Drifblimp Pass
DRIFBLIMPPASS.description: A pass to enable free rides on the Drifblimp.

PULSEITEM.name: Leyline Pulse Emitter
PULSEITEM.description: A piece of technology used to incapacitate Anomalies.

MININGKIT.name: Mining Kit
MININGKIT.description: A hammer and pickaxe for unearthing lost goods.

BLASTPOWDER.name: Blast Powder
BLASTPOWDER.description: An explosive powder used to break up certain rock formations.

MEGASTONEESSENCE.name: Mega Stone Essence
MEGASTONEESSENCE.description: The essence of a Mega Stone. This can be used to craft Mega Stones.

GHOSTDETECTORKIT.name: Ghost Detector Kit
GHOSTDETECTORKIT.description: A kit used for tracing the presence of supernatural residue.

CAMPINGGEAR.name: Camping Gear
CAMPINGGEAR.description: Gear for camping outside. Can be used to advance time.

UNIPHONE.name: Uniphone
UNIPHONE.description: A tool that can be used to contact anyone across universes and timelines.

DEMONICEYE.name: Demonic Eye
DEMONICEYE.description: Guides the wielder towards uncaught species while providing demonic speed for a guaranteed escape.

BLACKMARKETTOKEN.name: Black Market Token
BLACKMARKETTOKEN.description: Allows you free entry into the Black Market.

ASSAULTARMOR.name: Assault Armor
ASSAULTARMOR.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This offensive vest raises Def but prevents the use of status moves.

LOADEDDICE.name: Loaded Dice
LOADEDDICE.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It ensures the holder's multistrike moves hit more times.

ROCKSMASHITEM.name: Pickaxe
ROCKSMASHITEM.description: This can be used to smash rocks.

CUTITEM.name: Axe
CUTITEM.description: This can be used to cut trees.

STRENGTHITEM.name: Strength Gauntlet
STRENGTHITEM.description: This can be used to push big objects.

SURFITEM.name: Inflatable Raft
SURFITEM.description: This can be used to surf.

FLYITEM.name: Nimbus
FLYITEM.description: A flying cloud that can only be ridden by those with a pure heart.

HEADBUTTITEM.name: Punching Gloves
HEADBUTTITEM.description: Punch the tree to shake it.

FLASHITEM.name: Lantern
FLASHITEM.description: This can be used to illuminate areas.

DIGITEM.name: Used Shovel
DIGITEM.description: It is a Shovel, it can dig holes.

DIVEITEM.name: Scuba Gear
DIVEITEM.description: It allows you to breathe under water.

SWEETSCENTITEM.name: Essence Mixture
SWEETSCENTITEM.description: It allows you to spread a sweet essence around you.

TELEPORTITEM.name: Disk of returning
TELEPORTITEM.description: This can be used to return to the last healing place.

WATERFALLITEM.name: Float Barclet
WATERFALLITEM.description: Unique braclet that allows the user to swim up a waterfall.

WHIRLPOOLITEM.name: Hand Paddles
WHIRLPOOLITEM.description: Unique paddles that allow the user to swim across a whirlpool.

ROCKCLIMBITEM.name: Climbing Gear
ROCKCLIMBITEM.description: This can be used to climb big ledges.

ICEBARRIEREITEM.name: Ice Pick
ICEBARRIEREITEM.description: This can be used on ice barriers to break with ease.

DEFOGITEM.name: Magic Fan
DEFOGITEM.description: A magic fan that can push fog away..

WEATHERGADGETITEM.name: Weather Gadget
WEATHERGADGETITEM.description: A gadget used to change the weather.

CAMOUFLAGEITEM.name: Cloak of Kecleon
CAMOUFLAGEITEM.description: A wizard used to own this, allowing you to conceal yourself.

LIVESUPPORTON.name: Live Support (On)
LIVESUPPORTON.description: A motor-powered device that heals the party over time as you travel.

LIVESUPPORTOFF.name: Live Support (Off)
LIVESUPPORTOFF.description: The device is inactive. Click to turn on.

BERRYCHARM.name: Berry Charm
BERRYCHARM.description: A berry charm said to increase the yield from berry trees.

CYBERFOSSIL.name: Cyber Fossil
CYBERFOSSIL.description: A fossil that has some futuristic mechanical parts embedded in it somehow.

HPCRYSTAL1.name: Hidden Crystal
HPCRYSTAL1.description: A crystal that can change the type of a Pokemon's Hidden Power but is consumed.

MACEDONIAFOSSIL.name: Macedonia Fossil
MACEDONIAFOSSIL.description: A fossil in the shape of a tropical fruit.

ROOMEXTENDER.name: Room Extender
ROOMEXTENDER.description: This item does nothing unless you have the Room Extension Mod installed.

SUITCASE.name: Suitcase
SUITCASE.description: This item does nothing unless you have the Suitcase Mod installed.

WIZARDHAT.name: Wizard Hat
WIZARDHAT.description: A magically enchated hat from Mensa Village. Wearing it makes wild pokemon more likely to hold items.

BOOSTERENERGY.description: An ancient Tablet inscribed with odd symbols. It imbues a Pokemon with a new ability.
